name: refrigerator production | refrigerator | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19505/documentation

This activity represents the production and disposal of an average refrigerator which is approximately 60 kg in mass. It has the envisaged lifetime of 10 years and is manufactured in China.The figures on material inputs from technosphere and electricity required to produce an average refrigerator are taken from Xiao et al. 2015. The figure on the annual production volume is taken from German International Cooperation 2011. 

This activity starts with the reception of materials at the factory.

The activity includes the processes of material and energy use in manufacturing an average refrigerator. The inventory additionally accounts for disposal of all materials. Packaging is not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/275:Manufacture of domestic appliances/2750:Manufacture of domestic appliances

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The literature sources used refer to primary data from 2015. This represents current technology.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Geography GLO was chosen because the dataset aims to represent the production of an average refrigerator. The literature sources used refer to manufacturing in China.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The literature sources used refer to manufacturing in China.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Manufacturing data are taken from Xiao et al. 2015. Data on the annual production volume are taken from German International Cooperation 2011. Sources: Xiao, R., Zhang, Y., Liu, X., and Yuan, Z., 2015. A life-cycle assessment of household refrigerators in China. Journal of Cleaner Production, 95, 301-310. German International Cooperation 2011. Production conversion of domestic refrigerators from halogenated to hydrocarbon refrigerants. A guideline. GIZ, Eschborn, Germany. Available from: https://www.giz.de/expertise/downloads/giz2011-en-production-conversion-domestic-refrigerators.pdf (Accessed 20 January 2018).

exchanges.description: Estimated value.The input of infrastructure is approximated with the exchange 'metal working factory', this was chosen as metal is the main material constituting the final product. The general comment for the activity 'metal working faculty, GLO' [accessed 19.01.2018] specifies: '4.58E-10 units of this process are needed to produce 1 kg of final product. Additionally, the dataset for 'metal working factory' needs to be used together with the 'energy and auxilliary inputs, metal working factory', 1 kg of this exchange is required per 1 kg of final product.

exchanges.description: Estimated value.The input of infrastructure is approximated with the exchange 'metal working factory', this was chosen as metal is the main material constituting the final product. The general comment for the activity 'metal working faculty, GLO' [accessed 19.01.2018] specifies: '4.58E-10 units of this process are needed to produce 1 kg of final product. Additionally, the dataset for 'metal working factory' needs to be used together with the 'energy and auxilliary inputs, metal working factory', 1 kg of this exchange is required per 1 kg of final product.
